code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const EmployeeList=()=>{const[employees,setEmployees]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchEmployees=async()=>{try{const token=localStorage.getItem("token");const response=await axios.get("http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/employees/",{headers:{Authorization:`Bearer ${token}`}});setEmployees(response.data);}catch(error){console.error("Error fetching employees",error);}};fetchEmployees();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"employee-list",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Employee List"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Role"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Action"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:employees.map(employee=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:employee.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:employee.email}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:employee.role}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:`/employees/${employee.id}`,children:"View"})})]},employee.id))})]})]});};export default EmployeeList;
